Row.Text: A mysterious device capable of harnessing the power of a macguffin. As it is partially powered by absolute confidence in its divine purpose, protective walls cannot be built around any city it is located in.
Grants a special project that awakens a macguffin to increase its power.
Grants a special project that allows an awakened macguffin to achieve ascension, further increasing its power.
This sage will entrust us with a mysterious and powerful macguffin.

Transform a regular macguffin located in this city's macguffin awakener into a more powerful awakened form. The awakener building is destroyed upon a succesful awakening. Fails if a macguffin is not located in the awakener.

Transform an awakened macguffin located in this city's macguffin ascender into a more powerful ascended form. The ascender building is destroyed upon a succesful ascension. Fails if an awakened macguffin is not located in the ascender.
The active macguffin in this city's Macguffin Altar is on Cooldown! Check back later! (Macguffin will only cool down while inside a Macguffin Altar)
Global Additional Cooldown Cost (Increased With Every Macguffin Activated): {1_PointsAvailable}
Allow the existence of [ICON_Honey_Passive_Macguffin] Passive Macguffins that grant standard yields such as [Icon_Gold] Gold, [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Food] Food, etc.
Allow the existence of [ICON_Honey_Passive_Macguffin] Passive Macguffins that grant bonus yields for each building in each district type.
Allow the existence of [ICON_Honey_Passive_Macguffin] Passive Macguffins that grant bonus policy slots.
Allow the existence of [ICON_Honey_Passive_Macguffin] Passive Macguffins that grant combat bonuses to land military units.
Allow the existence of [ICON_Honey_Passive_Macguffin] Passive Macguffins that grant bonuses towards religion.
Allow the existence of [ICON_Honey_Passive_Macguffin] Passive Macguffins that don't quite fit into any of the previous passive categories.
Allow the existence of [ICON_Honey_Active_Macguffin] Active Macguffins that grant standard yields such as [Icon_Gold] Gold, [ICON_Science] Science, [ICON_Food] Food, etc.
Allow the existence of [ICON_Honey_Active_Macguffin] Active Macguffins that help build tile improvements.
Allow the existence of [ICON_Honey_Active_Macguffin] Active Macguffins that attack or steal from civilizations you are at war with.
Allow the existence of [ICON_Honey_Active_Macguffin] Active Macguffins that don't quite fit into any of the previous active categories.
Grant a Macguffin to each player that forms a pantheon.
Grant a Macguffin players that complete the Political Philosophy civic.
Grant a Macguffin players that complete the Enlightenment civic.
Grant a Macguffin players that complete the Enviornmentalism civic.
Grant a Macguffin players that complete the Astronomy tech.
Grant a Macguffin to players upon completing their first wonder.
Grant a Macguffin to players upon completing their first city.
Grant a Macguffin to players upon aquiring their first naval unit. Embarked land units do not count.
Grant a Macguffin to players upon aquiring their first airborne unit. Observation Balloon and Drone units do not count.
Grant a Macguffin to players upon founding a religion.
The effects of the Ponderer's Orb being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar.
The effects of the Awakened Ponderer's Orb being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar.
The effects of the Ascended Ponderer's Orb being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar.
The effects of the Beholder's Eye being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Beauty is within it.
The effects of the Awakened Beholder's Eye being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar.
The effects of the Ascended Beholder's Eye being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar.

The effects of the Ascended Midas Prismon being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar.

The effects of the Leorozón being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Melee Units will gain +4 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Awakened Leorozón being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Melee Units will gain +6 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Ascended Leorozón being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Melee Units will gain +9 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the True Hoof being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Light Cavalry Units will gain +4 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Awakened True Hoof being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Light Cavalry Units will gain +6 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Ascended True Hoof being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Light Cavalry Units will gain +9 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Doom Hoof being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Heavy Cavalry Units will gain +4 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Awakened Doom Hoof being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Heavy Cavalry Units will gain +6 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Ascended Doom Hoof being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Heavy Cavalry Units will gain +9 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat

The effects of the Awakened Brick Breaker being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Siege Units will gain +6 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Ascended Brick Breaker being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Siege Units will gain +9 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Spectavian being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Ranged Units will gain +4 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Awakened Spectavian being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Ranged Units will gain +6 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Ascended Spectavian being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Ranged Units will gain +9 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Wispwalker being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Recon Units will gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Awakened Wispwalker being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Recon Units will gain +7 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Ascended Wispwalker being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Recon Units will gain +10 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Haelblaudt being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Anti-Cavalry Units will gain +4 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Awakened Haelblaudt being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Anti-Cavalry Units will gain +6 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Ascended Haelblaudt being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Anti-Cavalry Units will gain +9 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Ultra Violent Light being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. All land combat units will gain +2 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Awakened Ultra Violent Light being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. All land combat units will gain +3 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Ascended Ultra Violent Light being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. All land combat units will gain +5 [ICON_Strength] Strength in combat
The effects of the Blue Bricks being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Libraries in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Science] Science.

The effects of the Awakened Blue Bricks being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Libraries and Universities in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Science] Science and +2 [Icon_Science] Science respectfully.

The effects of the Ascended Blue Bricks being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Libraries, Universities, and Research Labs in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Science] Science, +2 [Icon_Science] Science, and +3 [Icon_Science] Science respectfully.
The effects of the Magenta Masonry being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Ampitheatres in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Culture] Culture.

The effects of the Awakened Magenta Masonry being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Ampitheatres and Museums in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Culture] Culture and +2 [Icon_Culture] Culture respectfully.

The effects of the Ascended Magenta Masonry being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Ampitheatres, Museums, and Broadcast Stations in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Culture] Culture, +2 [Icon_Culture] Culture, and +3 [Icon_Culture] Culture respectfully.
The effects of the Citrine Column being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Markets in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Gold] Gold.
The effects of the Awakened Citrine Column being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Markets and Banks in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Gold] Gold and +2 [Icon_Gold] Gold respectfully.

The effects of the Ascended Citrine Column being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Markets, Banks, and Stock Exchanges in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Gold] Gold, +2 [Icon_Gold] Gold, and +3 [Icon_Gold] Gold respectfully.
The effects of the Alabaster Plaster being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Shrines in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Faith] Faith.
The effects of the Awakened Alabaster Plaster being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Shrines and Temples in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Faith] Faith and +2 [Icon_Faith] Faith respectfully.

The effects of the Ascended Alabaster Plaster being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Shrines, Temples, and Tier 3 Religious Buildings in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Faith] Faith, +2 [Icon_Faith] Faith, and +3 [Icon_Faith] Faith respectfully.
The effects of the Aquamarine Driftwood being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Lighthouses in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Food] Food.

The effects of the Awakened Aquamarine Driftwood being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Lighthouses and Shipyards in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Food] Food and +2 [Icon_Production] Production respectfully.

The effects of the Ascended Aquamarine Driftwood being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Lighthouses, Shipyards, and Seaports in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Food] Food, +2 [Icon_Production] Production, and +3 [Icon_Gold] Gold respectfully.
The effects of the Crimson Clay being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Barracks or Stables in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Production] Production.

The effects of the Awakened Crimson Clay being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Barracks or Stables, and Armories in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Production] Production and +2 [Icon_Production] Production respectfully.

The effects of the Ascended Crimson Clay being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Barracks or Stables, Armories, and Military Academies in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Production] Production, +2 [Icon_Production] Production, and +3 [Icon_Production] Production respectfully.
The effects of the Amber Adobe being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Workshops in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Production] Production.

The effects of the Awakened Amber Adobe being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Workshops, and Factories in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Production] Production and +2 [Icon_Production] Production respectfully.

The effects of the Ascended Amber Adobe being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Workshops, Factories, and Power Plants in all cities will provide +1 [Icon_Production] Production, +2 [Icon_Production] Production, and +3 [Icon_Production] Production respectfully.
The effects of the Spearit being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Religious units will gain +2 [ICON_Strength] Strength in theological combat
The effects of the Awakened Spearit being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Religiousunits will gain +4 [ICON_Strength] Strength in theological combat
The effects of the Ascended Spearit being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Religious units will gain +7 [ICON_Strength] Strength in theological combat
The effects of the Cuniformation being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Religious pressure from your cities to adjacent cities is 25% stronger.
The effects of the Awakened Cuniformation being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Religious pressure from your cities to adjacent cities is 50% stronger.
The effects of the Ascended Cuniformation being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Religious pressure from your cities to adjacent cities is 75% stronger.
The effects of the High Note being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Religious pressure from your cities reaches 50% further away.
The effects of the Awakened High Note being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Religious pressure from your cities reaches 80% further away.
The effects of the Ascended High Note being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Religious pressure from your cities reaches 120% further away.
The effects of the Nexus of Knowledge being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Nexus of Knowledge being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Nexus of Knowledge being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Nexus of Knowledge, granting three times this city's [ICON_Science] Science yield.
Activate the Awakened Nexus of Knowledge, granting six times this city's [ICON_Science] Science yield.
Activate the Ascended Nexus of Knowledge, granting ten times this city's [ICON_Science] Science yield.

Activate the Pain Brush, granting three times this city's [ICON_Culture] Culture yield.
Activate the Awakened Pain Brush, granting six times this city's [ICON_Culture] Culture yield.
Activate the Ascended Pain Brush, granting ten times this city's [ICON_Culture] Culture yield.
The effects of the Treasure Tonic being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Treasure Tonic being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Treasure Tonic being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Treasure Tonic, granting three times this city's [ICON_Gold] Gold yield.
Activate the Awakened Treasure Tonic, granting six times this city's [ICON_Gold] Gold yield.
Activate the Ascended Treasure Tonic, granting ten times this city's [ICON_Gold] Gold yield.
The effects of the Irrationalizer being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Irrationalizer being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Irrationalizer being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Irrationalizer, granting three times this city's [ICON_Faith] Faith yield.
Activate the Awakened Irrationalizer, granting six times this city's [ICON_Faith] Faith yield.
Activate the Ascended Irrationalizer, granting ten times this city's [ICON_Faith] Faith yield.
The effects of the LofesanFish being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened LofesanFish being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended LofesanFish being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the LofesanFish, giving a 33% chance to increase population in this city.
Activate the Awakened LofesanFish, giving a 50% chance to increase population in this city.
Activate the Ascended LofesanFish, giving a 75% chance to increase population in this city.
The effects of the Sezedmeens being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Sezedmeens being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Sezedmeens being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Sezedmeens, granting two times this city's [ICON_Production] Production in all cities.
Activate the Awakened Sezedmeens, granting three times this city's [ICON_Production] Production in all cities.
Activate the Ascended Sezedmeens, granting four times this city's [ICON_Production] Production in all cities.
The effects of the Motivatinator being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Motivatinator being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Motivatinator being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Motivatinator, granting a Builder unit.
Activate the Awakened Motivatinator, granting a Builder unit.
Activate the Ascended Motivatinator, granting a Builder unit.
The effects of the Notched Pickaxe being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Notched Pickaxe being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Notched Pickaxe being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Notched Pickaxe, granting either a mine or a quarry on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
Activate the Awakened Notched Pickaxe, granting two of either a mine or a quarry on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
Activate the Ascended Notched Pickaxe, granting three of either a mine or a quarry on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
The effects of the Farm Hand being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Farm Hand being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Farm Hand being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Farm Hand, granting either a farm or plantation on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
Activate the Awakened Farm Hand, granting two of either a farm or plantation on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
Activate the Ascended Farm Hand, granting three of either a farm or plantation on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
The effects of the Resinator being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Resinator being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Resinator being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Resinator, granting either a lumber mill or a camp on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
Activate the Awakened Resinator, granting two of either a lumber mill or a camp on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
Activate the Ascended Resinator, granting three of either a lumber mill or a camp on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
The effects of the Live Stock being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Live Stock being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Live Stock being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Live Stock, granting either a lumber mill or a camp on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
Activate the Awakened Live Stock, granting two of either a lumber mill or a camp on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
Activate the Ascended Live Stock, granting three of either a lumber mill or a camp on a valid tile in your empire. Tiles with an incompatible resource will not be considered.
The effects of the Volt Orb being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 2 [Icon_Power] Power in all cities.
The effects of the Awakened Volt Orb being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 4 [Icon_Power] Power in all cities.
The effects of the Ascended Volt Orb being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 6 [Icon_Power] Power in all cities.
The effects of the Versatall being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron and 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] Horses.

The effects of the Awakened Versatall being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron, 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] Horses, 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_NITER] Niter, and 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal.

The effects of the Ascended Versatall being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_IRON] Iron, 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_HORSES] Horses, 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_NITER] Niter, 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_COAL] Coal, 2 [ICON_RESOURCE_OIL] Oil, and 1 [ICON_RESOURCE_URANIUM] Uranium.
The effects of the Suzarizer being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 1 influence point per turn towards [Icon_Envoy] Envoys.
The effects of the Awakened Suzarizer being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 2 influence points per turn towards [Icon_Envoy] Envoys.
The effects of the Ascended Suzarizer being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 3 influence points per turn towards [Icon_Envoy] Envoys.
The effects of the Black Mail being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 1 [Icon_Favor] Diplomatic Favor per turn.
The effects of the Awakened Black Mail being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 2 [Icon_Favor] Diplomatic Favor per turn.
The effects of the Ascended Black Mail being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants 1 [Icon_Favor] Diplomatic Favor per turn.
Awakened World's Largest Ball of Yarn
Ascended World's Largest Ball of Yarn
The effects of the World's Largest Ball of Yarn being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants +10% [Icon_Tourism] Tourism across your empire.
The effects of the Awakened World's Largest Ball of Yarn being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants +25% [Icon_Tourism] Tourism across your empire.
The effects of the Ascended World's Largest Ball of Yarn being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants +40% [Icon_Tourism] Tourism across your empire.
The effects of the Party Heart being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants +1 [Icon_Amenities] Amenities from entertainment to all your cities within 7 tiles.
The effects of the Awakened Party Heart being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants +1 [Icon_Amenities] Amenities from entertainment to all your cities within 11 tiles.
The effects of the Ascended Party Heart being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants +1 [Icon_Amenities] Amenities from entertainment to all your cities within 16 tiles.
The effects of the Irradiator being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Irradiator being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Irradiator being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Irradiator, splattering radiation fallout on two random tiles of each major civilization you are at war with.
Activate the Awakened Irradiator, splattering radiation fallout on four random tiles of each major civilization you are at war with.
Activate the Ascended Irradiator, splattering radiation fallout on six random tiles of each major civilization you are at war with.
The effects of the Dilapidater being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Dilapidater being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Dilapidater being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Dilapidater, pillaging two random improvements from every major civilization you are at war with.
Activate the Awakened Dilapidater, pillaging four random improvements from every major civilization you are at war with.
Activate the Ascended Dilapidater, pillaging six random improvements from every major civilization you are at war with.
The effects of the Voodall being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Voodall being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Voodall being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Voodall, dealing up to 25 damage to a unit belonging to every major civilization you are at war with.
Activate the Awakened Voodall, dealing up to 50 damage to two units belonging to every major civilization you are at war with.
Activate the Ascended Voodall, dealing up to 75 damage to three units belonging to every major civilization you are at war with.
The effects of the Fraudder being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Fraudder being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Fraudder being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Fraudder, stealing up to 25 [Icon_Gold] Gold from each major civilization you are at war with.
Activate the Awakened Fraudder, stealing up to 75 [Icon_Gold] Gold from each major civilization you are at war with.
Activate the Ascended Fraudder, stealing up to 150 [Icon_Gold] Gold from each major civilization you are at war with.
The effects of the Wings of Rem being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
The effects of the Awakened Wings of Rem being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city..
The effects of the Ascended Wings of Rem being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Adds a special project to this city.
Activate the Wings of Rem, stealing up to 25 [Icon_Faith] Faith from each major civilization you are at war with.
Activate the Awakened Wings of Rem, stealing up to 75 [Icon_Faith] Faith from each major civilization you are at war with.
Activate the Ascended Wings of Rem, stealing up to 150 [Icon_Faith] Faith from each major civilization you are at war with.
The effects of the Trumpain being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants an additional military card slot on the policy screen.
The effects of the Awakened Trumpain being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants two additional military card slots on the policy screen.
The effects of the Ascended Trumpain being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants three additional military card slots on the policy screen.
The effects of the Pot Of Greed being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants an additional economic card slot on the policy screen.
The effects of the Awakened Pot Of Greed being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants two additional economic card slots on the policy screen.
The effects of the Ascended Pot Of Greed being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants three additional economic card slots on the policy screen.
The effects of the All Love Branch being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants an additional diplomatic card slot on the policy screen.
The effects of the Awakened All Love Branch being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants two additional diplomatic card slots on the policy screen.
The effects of the Ascended All Love Branch being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants three additional diplomatic card slots on the policy screen.
The effects of the Wildest Card being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants an additional wildcard card slot on the policy screen.
The effects of the Awakened Wildest Card being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants two additional wildcard card slots on the policy screen
The effects of the Ascended Wildest Card being placed in this city's Macguffin Altar. Grants three additional wildcard card slots on the policy screen
